mapper.sql:
from missingBoard as a left join uAnimal as b on b.uaSeq = a.uAnimal_uaSeq left join user as c on b.user_uSeq = c.uSeq left join uaImg as d on d.rSeq = b.uaSeq where 1=1 and mbDelNy = 0
AND b.uaName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.mbTitle LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.mbDetailAddr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND c.uNickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
select a.mbSeq, a.mbTitle, a.mbDetailAddr, a.mbDate, a.mbRegDate, c.uNickname, d.fPath
order by mbSeq desc limit #{startRnumForMysql},#{rowNumToShow}

select a.mbSeq, e.cName, a.mbTitle, a.mbLat, a.mbLon, a.mbDetailAddr, a.mbStreetAddr, a.mbPostalCode, a.mbEtc, a.mbDate, a.mbRegDate, a.mbReward, format(a.mbReward,0) as mbRewardformat, b.uaName, b.uaBreed, b.uaBOD, b.user_uSeq, b.uaSeq, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE(b.uaBOD), CURDATE()) AS age, c.uNickname, d.fPath from missingBoard as a left join uAnimal as b on b.uaSeq = a.uAnimal_uaSeq left join user as c on b.user_uSeq = c.uSeq left join uaImg as d on d.rSeq = b.uaSeq left join code as e on e.cSeq = b.uaGenderCd where 1=1 and mbDelNy = 0 and a.mbSeq = #{mbSeq}

select a.mbcComment, a.mbcRegDate, b.uNickname from mbComment as a left join user as b on a.user_uSeq = b.uSeq where 1=1 and a.missingBoard_mbSeq = #{mbSeq} order by a.mbcSeq desc limit #{startRnumForMysql},#{rowNumToShow}
select count(*) from mbComment as a left join user as b on a.user_uSeq = b.uSeq where 1=1 and a.missingBoard_mbSeq = #{mbSeq}
select a.uaSeq, a.uaName from uAnimal as a where 1=1 and a.uaDelNy = 0 and a.user_uSeq = #{user_uSeq}

select a.uaName, a.uaBOD, a.uaBreed, a.uaGenderCd, (select b.cName from code as b where b.cSeq = a.uaGenderCd) as cName from uAnimal as a where 1=1 and
a.uaSeq = #{uAnimal_uaSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into missingBoard ( mbDetailAddr, uAnimal_uaSeq, mbFindCd, mbPostalCode, mbStreetAddr, mbEtc, mbReward, mbLat, mbLon, mbRegDate, mbTitle, mbDate )values ( #{mbDetailAddr}, #{uAnimal_uaSeq}, 7, #{mbPostalCode}, #{mbStreetAddr}, #{mbEtc}, #{mbReward}, #{mbLat}, #{mbLon}, now(), #{mbTitle}, #{mbDate} )
mapper.update: update missingBoard set mbDetailAddr = #{mbDetailAddr}, uAnimal_uaSeq = #{uAnimal_uaSeq}, mbFindCd = #{mbFindCd}, mbPostalCode = #{mbPostalCode}, mbStreetAddr = #{mbStreetAddr}, mbEtc = #{mbEtc}, mbReward = #{mbReward}, mbLat = #{mbLat}, mbLon = #{mbLon}, mbTitle = #{mbTitle}, mbDate = #{mbDate}, mbMofDate = now() where 1=1 and mbSeq = #{mbSeq}
update missingBoard set mbDelNy = 1 where 1=1 and mbSeq = #{mbSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into mbComment ( user_uSeq, missingBoard_mbSeq, mbcComment, mbcRegDate )values ( #{user_uSeq}, #{mbSeq}, #{mbcComment}, now() )
